translation.en: - What is this? -
Don't you know who I am?
- I demand you open this gate! -
Now, follow me.
Carefully, just like this.
Okay, raise your paper.
And with scales, some grass, some clouds.
Stupid teacher.
- Hi, Mom. - Hi, sweetie.
Hi, Dad.
There you are. Hungry? You want a snack?
Hey, Dad.
- What'd you learn? - We learned about dragons.
- Your mom forgot you. She doesn't-- - Jimmy, stop. It's rude.
translation.es: - Tu mamá te olvidó. - Jimmy, basta.

translation.en: You know it's only the two of them. She's trying her best.
translation.es: Sabes que están solos. Hace lo que puede.

translation.en: I'm Li Na.
I'm Din.
You can walk home with me.
My dad's always late.
- I'm gonna get you! - See the world dancing in your eyes
- Which one? - This one.
Fly, little Clucky!
I'll call you later.
No, no, you first got to multiply the top by the bottom.
translation.es: No, primero debes multiplicar el de arriba.

translation.en: - Come here, little monkey. Up! - Bye, Din!
Hot!
- You're late! - I had to get the stuff!
All right, scales. Oh! Roller skates!
Ready, set, awesome dragon kite!
I guess it didn't work.
Let's make a promise to be best friends forever.
Friends forever…
…year by year,
upon this we will always swear.
- Come on. It's time to go. - Dad, we said--
translation.es: - Es hora de irnos. - Papá, dijimos…

translation.en: Li Na, we've been over this already.
I have to go, Din.
But I fixed our kite.
Come along, Li Na.
Take care, kiddo.
Bye, Din.
Eyes ahead, Na Na.
We're off to a… a better life, and we have to leave this one behind.
translation.es: Tendremos una nueva vida y debemos dejar esta atrás.

translation.en: Okay, uh, next up, 235 Gao Shue Street.
translation.es: Bien, próxima entrega: calle Gao Shue 235.

translation.en: - Delivery! - Thank you!
You're welcome!
- Delivery! Have a nice day! - Thank you!
- Delivery! Welcome! - Thank you.
- Delivery! - Thank you.
- Delivery! - Thank you.
Oh, Wei! Wei, Wei, Wei, Wei!
Din? Be careful.
What are you doing?
- Wei! Old buddy… - Dude, you gotta watch where you're going.
translation.es: ¡Wei! Viejo amigo. Ten cuidado por dónde vas.

translation.en: - Think you could get the assignment? - You haven't been to class in two weeks.
translation.es: ¿Me conseguirías la tarea? Trabajas mucho y no vas a clase.

translation.en: I gotta earn extra cash for this thing I'm working on.
translation.es: Necesito algo de dinero extra para algo.

translation.en: Thing? Wait a minute, does this have to do with that girl?
What? No.
Maybe.
Okay, it's her birthday. I'm planning something special.
translation.es: Sí, es su cumpleaños, y planeo algo especial.

translation.en: So, can you just get me the assignment, please?
- I'll do your homework for a week. - Fine.
translation.es: - Haré tu tarea por una semana. - Bien.

translation.en: Thanks. You're the best.
- - So smart and yet so stupid.
translation.es: Es tan inteligente y tan tonto.

translation.en: Last delivery.
Uh, hello?
Uh, hello?
Did somebody order dumpling soup?
- Um, hello? - Come in.
It's locked.
I know.
Oh. Well, uh, I'll just…  …go around.
Did you order the dumpling soup?
I am a god.
Okay,
but did you order the--
And I have chosen you! For you are pure of heart.
translation.es: ¡Y te elegí a ti! Porque eres de corazón noble.

translation.en: Well, I try to be friendly. Keep my five- star rating.
translation.es: Trato de ser amable y mantener las estrellas.

translation.en: Now, will you be paying with cash or--
Take this.
It contains everything you need.
Um, actually, I need $7.35--
You dare reject the will of the gods?
Kind of…
yeah?
You know what? This one's on me, okay? I really gotta run, so…
translation.es: ¿Sabe qué? Descuide, no me pague. Estoy apurado…

translation.en: Thanks for the teapot and have a nice day.
Wait. Hot sauce! Huh?
Thanks.
It's just not the same without hot sauce.
translation.es: No es lo mismo sin picante.

translation.en: - Don't you have somewhere to be? - Huh?
Wait, five o'clock?
How have I been here for an hour? I gotta go!
Don't close. Please, don't close.
Kid, be realistic.
Wait! Wait, wait, wait!
Okay, thank you for your help!
- Hey. I know! - Your mom's looking for you.
translation.es: - ¡Hola! - Tu mamá te busca. Lo sé.

translation.en: Water, water, water.
- D7 to checkmate! - Ooh!
See you tonight.
I said, If you don't like garlic, eat something else! - - Like a napkin!
translation.es: Y dije: Si no te gusta el ajo, come otra cosa, una servilleta tal vez.

translation.en: Hey, Mom. Here's the groceries you wanted.
Look who's here! You're late.
Again.
Oh. I, uh, stayed late for study group, as usual.
Wait!
Eat. Food for your brain.
Thanks. I'll just take this inside and have it with a side of calculus.
translation.es: Gracias. Lo acompañaré con la tarea de Cálculo.

translation.en: Ah, look at him, all grown up and working hard.
Little Din with a college degree. Can you believe it?
- I only wish my son had been so dedicated. - Such a good boy.
translation.es: - Ojalá mi hijo hubiera sido tan dedicado. - Tan bueno.

translation.en: Doing my best. I'm gonna go get sta--
translation.es: - Me esfuerzo. Iré a… - Me alegro por ti.

translation.en: I'm happy for you, kiddo. Your future is all set.
translation.es: - Me esfuerzo. Iré a… - Me alegro por ti. Tendrás todo.

translation.en: - A steady job, a big paycheck! - A shiny new refrigerator.
- A nice car. - And a flat screen. Big one!
Now, now, stop distracting him!
- He's got work to do. - Din! I'll be right over.
Uh, yes, so much work to do. I better get started on that--
translation.es: Sí, mucha tarea. Mejor empiezo antes…

translation.en: Here's the assignment.
The teacher said if you don't come to at least one class this semester, he's going to fail you.
translation.es: El profe dijo que, si no vas a una clase este semestre, te reprobará.

translation.en: Oh, hey, Ms. Din. Even if you ace the final…
translation.es: Hola, señora Din. Aunque saques diez en el final…

translation.en: again.
I'm sorry.
I knew it. You've been skipping school and lying to your mother.
translation.es: Lo sabía. Faltaste a clase y me mentiste.

translation.en: What have you been doing? Lounging in some internet cafe?
translation.es: ¿Qué? ¿Estuviste metido en un café con internet?

translation.en: - Can you believe it? - Such a bad boy.
You're not helping!
Why do this? You're a good student! You could ruin your future.
translation.es: - Mamá… - ¿Por qué? ¡Eres inteligente! Arruinarás tu futuro.

translation.en: - True. There goes the college degree. - You're not helping!
- I just-- - Just what?
I was just doing a little side job.
Side job?
You have one job, and one job only. That is to study.
- I know, but-- - But what?
What could possibly be more important than studying?
translation.es: ¿Qué podría ser más importante que estudiar?

translation.en: Nothing, Mom.
Nothing.
- This is getting juicy. - What did he say? I can't hear.
translation.es: - Se puso jugoso. - ¿Qué dijo? No oigo nada.

translation.en: You're not helping!
- I know I'm hard on you, but I'm-- - You're right, Mom.
translation.es: - Sé que soy exigente… - Tienes razón, ma.

translation.en: You're right.
It's there?
This can't be right.
- Uh, what are we looking for again? - A teapot!
Open the door.
Good evening, gentlemen.
This area's off- limits.
Can I help you?
Yes, I believe you can.
Stop! Stop! Stop right there.
- Put your hands where I can see them. - Oh…
I'm afraid that's not going to happen.
translation.es: Me temo que eso no sucederá.

translation.en: - Uh… Okay, sir. - You first, man.
- You're under arrest. - Hold on a minute, there.
I'll fix that later.
Aiya. She's late again.
Okay.
What? Oh, that old thing.
Well, well, well.
Look who decided to show up.
Starting to take me for granted, huh?
I'm kidding. I'm kidding.
So, what do you think of the suit?
Good enough to get into the birthday party of the famous Li Na Wang?
translation.es: ¿Es adecuado para el cumpleaños de la famosa Li Na Wang?

translation.en: Good.
I think so too.
Okay, Din, tomorrow's the big day.
translation.es: Din, mañana es el gran día.

translation.en: How are we gonna do this? What am I gonna say?
Happy birthday, it's your best friend Din! No, that's too strong.
Good evening, Li Na. Will you allow me to kiss your hand?
translation.es: Buenas noches, Li Na, permítame besar su mano.

translation.en: Ugh. Man, quit being a creep, Din.
Oh yeah, sure, I'll dance with you.
Say, you look kind of familiar.
I got you a present. You still like kites?
What am I saying? Of course she still likes kites.
Okay, just… calm down.
Be honest.
Hey, Li Na. Happy birthday.
I just want to say, - it's been a long time and… -
translation.es: Solo quiero decir que pasó mucho tiempo y…

translation.en: …I miss you.
What?
- Oh no! - Oh, gosh. Um…
- Hold on, I can fix this. - Oh, come on.
translation.es: Espera, lo puedo arreglar. Ay, ¿en serio?

translation.en: What was I thinking?
No, no, no!
Ah…
I must look totally crazy.
It's just…
I don't know what else to do.
I can see my whole life laid out ahead of me,
and I'm trying my best, trying to make everyone proud,
translation.es: y me estoy esforzando. Intento enorgullecer a todos, pero todo el tiempo siento que falta algo.

translation.en: but the whole time it feels like something is missing.
translation.es: Intento enorgullecer a todos, pero todo el tiempo siento que falta algo.

translation.en: I just wish…
I just wish I could keep our promise.
Tea is ready.
Wait, what? The tea is ready?
Well, that was…
Greetings, great master!
The heavens have opened, your wishes will be granted,
translation.es: El cielo se abrió y tus deseos serán concedidos,

translation.en: for I am LongZhu!
Oh, a peasant boy. Well, this'll be easy.
Look, I know what you're thinking.
Do my eyes deceive me? A super, all- powerful, magical Wish Dragon!
translation.es: ¿Qué ven mis ojos? Un dragón mágico de los deseos superpoderoso.

translation.en: Could this be real? Is magic real?
Yes.
It's real.
Now that we got that out of the way, onto the important part.
translation.es: Ya que aclaramos eso, a lo importante.

translation.en: Am I… am I dead?
Grandma! It's Din!
- I fell off the roof. I'm coming for you! - No, no.
translation.es: - Me caí del techo. Ahí voy. - No.

translation.en: No, you're very much alive.
I am a magical Wish Dragon,
translation.es: Soy un dragón de los deseos

translation.en: who will grant three wishes to the owner of this teapot.
translation.es: y le concederé tres deseos al dueño de esta tetera.

translation.en: And you, sir, are my master!
So, go ahead, wish away!
Okay, you got me. Where are the hidden cameras?
- Great joke, guys. - Joke?
- Is this a hologram or something? - I assure you not.
translation.es: - ¿Es un holograma? - Te aseguro que no.

translation.en: Do you wish for a suit of armor made of solid gold?
It shall be so.
Do you wish for the strength of 1,000 men? Boom!
- It shall be so. - Whoa.
For the finest carriage in all the land?
Pow! It's yours!
The wings of a hawk!
Or the legs of a giraffe. Feels good up here, right?
translation.es: O patas de jirafa. Buena vista, ¿no?

translation.en: Or anything else
that your heart desires.
I'm thinking about starting one of those--
translation.es: Quiero abrir uno de esos donde venden animales.

translation.en: Where they sell animals. Pet- type stores.
translation.es: Quiero abrir uno de esos donde venden animales. Como de mascotas.

translation.en: You going to sell Chow Chows? That's a good dog.
translation.es: ¿Venderás chow chow? Es un buen perro.

translation.en: No one will be selling anything if we don't find that teapot.
translation.es: Nadie venderá nada si no encontramos esa tetera.

translation.en: Every time I try to make casual conversation, you guys give me a hard time.
translation.es: Cada vez que quiero conversar, me tratan mal.

translation.en: So, you're a Wish Dragon?
Yes.
How many wishes do I get? You get three wishes.
- How do you fit in this teapot? - Uh, it's magic. It's a magic teapot.
translation.es: - ¿Cómo cabes aquí? - Es una tetera mágica.

translation.en: So small. How old are you?
- That's not-- - Where'd you come from?
- All you need-- - Look at your arms.
Why are you pink? Shouldn't you be green? Your face is so soft. I want to touch it.
translation.es: ¿Por qué eres rosa y no verde? Eres suave, quiero tocarte.

translation.en: Oh, can you breathe fire?
Okay. Look, peasant boy.
I don't have time. I'm not here to be your friend--
translation.es: No tengo tiempo y no vine a ser amigos…

translation.en: Whoa, you have to earn my friendship, and frankly you're not doing a good job.
translation.es: Debes ganarte mi amistad y no comenzaste muy bien.

translation.en: Listen carefully. Every Wish Dragon must serve 10 masters before they're free to enter the spirit world.
translation.es: Escucha, cada dragón debe servir a 10 amos antes de entrar al mundo espiritual.

translation.en: And you are the last one.
Now, I've been stuck…  …in this teapot for 1,000 years.
translation.es: Llevo mil años en esta tetera.

translation.en: The sooner we get this over with, the better.
translation.es: Así que, cuanto antes terminemos, mejor.

translation.en: Have I made myself clear?
I'm terribly sorry, young man, but I need that teapot.
translation.es: Lo siento, muchacho, pero necesitaré esa tetera.

translation.en: Uh, I-- I think it's his. Only the owner of the teapot can see me.
translation.es: - Es suya. - Solo el dueño de la tetera puede verme.

translation.en: Well, I'm sure he won't miss it.
translation.es: Estoy seguro de que no la extrañará.

translation.en: No way. I found it. Whoa!
Not good.
I wish I knew how to fight.
Come here.
That's a good teapot.
What the…
No, no, no, I didn't mean that. I take it back.
translation.es: No fue mi intención. Estoy arrepentido.

translation.en: Gimme that.
Teapot.
Give me that teapot right now.
Whoa, I just kicked through a door!
Gimme! Gimme! Mine! Mine!
You little twerp!
Uh… nobody's home?
I'm done asking nicely.
Are you telling me a teenage boy out- fought two full- grown men?
translation.es: ¿Quieren decir que un adolescente venció a dos adultos?

translation.en: - Well, sir-- - Actually, three men.
- Two- and- a- half. - You should have seen him.
It was 1,000 punches a minute. Kicks everywhere.
I've never seen so many arms and legs.
translation.es: Nunca vi tantas piernas y puños.

translation.en: This is not good.
The boy knows what he has.
translation.es: El muchacho sabe lo que tiene.

translation.en: Sir, if I may ask, what exactly does he have?
translation.es: Señor, si puedo preguntar, ¿qué tiene exactamente?

translation.en: That's none of your business. I'm paying you to find it.
translation.es: No es asunto suyo. Les pago para encontrarlo.

translation.en: - That is your only concern. - You haven't paid.
translation.es: - Solo eso. - No nos pagó nada.

translation.en: You'll be paid when I have the teapot, beyond your wildest dreams!
translation.es: Les pagaré más de lo que imaginan cuando la encuentren.

translation.en: Do you understand?
Forgive our incompetence, sir.
But the boy did leave something behind.
It's only a matter of time before we find him.
Din, up now!
- How about a kick to the face? - Huh? I said up!
translation.es: ¿Y una patada en la cara? ¡Dije arriba!

translation.en: - Ow. - Breakfast is on the table.
Thanks, Mom.
What a crazy dream.
Din, I'm working late tonight.
So, leftovers for dinner, okay?
Delicious.
So, leftovers for dinner.
Yeah.
Leftovers.
Stupid shoes.
Hey Mom, if you could wish for anything, what would it be?
translation.es: Si pudieras pedir un deseo, ¿qué sería?

translation.en: Din, why are you asking silly questions? Eat.
Okay, but seriously, Mom, if you could wish for anything.
translation.es: Pero en serio, mamá, si pudieras pedir lo que fuera.

translation.en: - A big house in the countryside? - Din, we went over this yesterday.
translation.es: - ¿Una casa grande? - Din, ya hablamos de esto.

translation.en: I want you to focus on your future.
translation.es: Que te concentres en tu futuro.

translation.en: That is what I wish for.
I'm more focused than I've ever been in my entire life.
translation.es: Nunca estuve tan concentrado en mi futuro.

translation.en: Hmm. Good. Now hurry up. You're gonna be late.
- What's that face? I know that. - I don't have a face. What?
translation.es: Conozco esa cara, ¿qué pasa? No. ¿Qué cara?

translation.en: Go to school. Stop planning things.
Um, hello? Dragon thingy?
You in there?
Excellent work, peasant boy.
One wish down, two to go. We could be done by lunch.
translation.es: Quedan dos deseos más y terminamos.

translation.en: What did you do to me? Why do I know kung fu?
You're welcome. You wish you could fight. I made you a master.
translation.es: De nada. Deseaste saber pelear, hice el resto.

translation.en: I didn't wish for… Hey, that's not fair. You said wish.
translation.es: - Yo no deseé… No es justo. - Dijiste la palabra.

translation.en: Oh, so just 'cause I said wish, now I'm stuck with these kung fu powers?
translation.es: ¿Solo por eso ahora tengo el poder del kung fu?

translation.en: - - Cool.
Yes, it's all very cool.
So, onto that second wish.
Let me recommend the all- time favorite. A giant pile of gold!
translation.es: Te mostraré el favorito de todos: ¡un montón de oro!

translation.en: Now, repeat after me. I wish for… You're not talking.
translation.es: Repite conmigo. Deseo… No estás hablando.

translation.en: A giant pile of… You're not saying anything.
translation.es: Un montón de… No estás repitiendo.

translation.en: Hey, stop rushing me.
Ah, you must be the conquering type. I see that killer instinct in your eyes.
translation.es: Eres del estilo conquistador, puedo verlo.

translation.en: Easy. Just wish for your very own personal army!
Why would I need an army?
You're quite a simple fellow.
Not to worry. Here's one the peasant- folk love.
translation.es: Este es el que quieren los muchachos como tú.

translation.en: I can allow you to speak with a loved one
translation.es: Puedo hacer que hables con un ser amado

translation.en: on the other side of China!
translation.es: aun del otro lado de China.

translation.en: I'm a loved one. I can't hear you. You're very far away.
translation.es: Amado, no te escucho, estás muy lejos.

translation.en: - There's a wall here. It's cool, but-- - You mean, like, a cell phone?
translation.es: Hay un muro. Es genial, pero… ¿Como con un celular?

translation.en: What dark magic is this?
Where is the tiny orchestra? How do they fit in this metal box?
Two wishes. Anything I want.
translation.es: Dos deseos. Lo que yo quiera.

translation.en: The birthday party. I know what I want.
Wait, a wish?
Yeah, yeah, a wish.
Excellent.
A giant metal bird?
- What are you doing? - Uh, riding my magical Wish Dragon. Away!
translation.es: ¿Qué haces? Monto mi dragón mágico. ¡A volar!

translation.en: What are you doing?
If you're not gonna let me ride you, we catch the bus.
translation.es: Si no puedo montarte, tomaremos un autobús.

translation.en: The bus? Is that some kind of animal?
- How long have you been in that teapot? - Is it still the Qing Dynasty?
translation.es: ¿Hace cuánto estás atrapado? No sé, ¿continúa la dinastía Qing?

translation.en: - Ooh! - Long!
How did you get in there?
Don't ignore me when I'm talking, peasant.
translation.es: No me ignores cuando te hablo.

translation.en: It's not a little man. It's television.
translation.es: No está ahí, es una tele.

translation.en: What's this?
Car.
Ah, the spoils of war on display?
- What is this invisible force-- - Glass!
- What purpose-- - Stop light.
- What in the world? - Ice cream.
- How is this-- - Electricity.
- I know it's all amazing-- - Amazing?
When you've been around as long as I have, there's nothing in this world that could amaze--
translation.es: Cuando has vivido tanto como yo, no hay nada que pueda sor…

translation.en: Shrimp chips.
Peasant food, no doubt.
Magnificent!
Okay, we're here.
- You gonna make a wish now? - I will. Just wait until we get there.
translation.es: - ¿Pedirás el deseo o qué? - Sí, cuando lleguemos.

translation.en: - Get where? -
Great Wall of China!
A giant chariot made of steel and glass! Long, this is bus. Come on.
translation.es: - ¡Un carruaje de acero y vidrio! - Es el autobús.

translation.en: - Out of the way. - My word!
- And watch your step. Carefully. - Thank you, kind sir.
- No. There must be a better… - Long, what are you doing?
translation.es: - No. Debe haber algo mejor. - Long, ¿qué haces?

translation.en: That's more like it.
Long, what are you doing? Getting a personal carriage.
translation.es: - Long, ¿qué haces? - Quiero un carruaje personal.

translation.en: I can't afford a personal carriage, which is why we were taking the bus.
translation.es: No me alcanza para ese, por eso tomamos el autobús.

translation.en: Did you just steal my money?
- …we won't make the express. - Here.
- Hey, where did you get this? - You know, magic.
translation.es: - ¿De dónde lo sacaste? - Ya sabes, magia.

translation.en: I, uh, had a really big lunch.
This is more like it!
Uh, what is this? Traffic.
Traffic.
- That some kind of national holiday? - Ha!
You mean to tell me this happens every single day?
translation.es: ¿Me dices que esto pasa todos los días?

translation.en: The sun is moving faster than us.
translation.es: El sol se mueve más rápido.

translation.en: This is worse than my teapot.
Ugh! I'm never going to make it in time. I wish this traffic would just--
translation.es: Nunca llegaré a tiempo. Desearía que el tránsito…

translation.en: Yes, go ahead.
Long, I'm not gonna waste a wish on traffic!
- Look, Din, you're gonna have to use-- -
You're gonna have to--
You're going to have to--
- You're gonna have to use-- -
Use a wish!
You son of a cabbage farmer! There is no place to go!
translation.es: Hijo de un granjero, no se puede avanzar.

translation.en: Blow your trumpet all you want. It won't make any difference at all!
translation.es: ¡Sigue con la bocina! ¡No servirá de nada!

translation.en: You know, Long, we'll get there eventually.
Even if it takes all day.
translation.es: Aunque nos lleve todo el día.

translation.en: All day?
I heard one traffic jam lasted three weeks.
translation.es: Una vez, un embotellamiento duró tres semanas.

translation.en: If only I had a magical dragon that could fly.
translation.es: Si tan solo tuviera un dragón para volar.

translation.en: I know what you're trying. Not gonna work.
I spent 1,000 years in that teapot. I can spend hours in your traffic.
translation.es: Pasé mil años en la tetera, esto no es nada.

translation.en: Hey, I got an idea. Why don't we listen to the tiny orchestra while we wait?
translation.es: Tengo una idea: escuchemos a la orquestita mientras.

translation.en: Not gonna work, Din.
Use your wish, Din.
Fine!
Careful what you don't wish for.
translation.es: Cuidado con lo que no deseas. Presióname más y no dudaré…

translation.en: - Push me too far, I will not hesitate to-- - Fly everywhere?
translation.es: Cuidado con lo que no deseas. Presióname más y no dudaré… ¿Qué? ¿En volar?

translation.en: You're amazing! Look. Is there anything you can't do?
translation.es: ¡Eres genial! ¿Hay algo que no puedas hacer?

translation.en: Well, that's very-- Ah!
Anyways, where are we going?
Ah, there it is! Down there.
We're here.
- Wishing time. - Ah!
Excellent. I see where this is going.
Now, when choosing a palace, it is very important that--
translation.es: Al elegir un palacio, es importante…

translation.en: Uh, what are you do--
- - Quit goofing off. This is serious.
Okay, what's the wish? Okay, you see her?
Hi, good evening.
- Thank you for coming. - Li Na, happy birthday.
How are you?
That's my second wish, Long.
- I wish-- - Stop, stop, stop!
- I can't do love. - What? No, Long, it's not--
Couple of rules. I can't time travel, I can't kill,
translation.es: No puedo viajar en el tiempo ni matar

translation.en: and it pains me to inform you, not really, I can't make people fall in love with you.
translation.es: y me duele informarte que no puedo hacer que alguien te ame.

translation.en: No, no, no, it's not like that, Long.
She's my best friend.
That's my wish.
I want my friend back.
Wait, rewind. You can wish for anything in the whole world, and you waste it on a friend?
translation.es: Retrocede. ¿Puedes desear lo que sea y lo desperdiciarás en una amiga?

translation.en: What could be more important?
translation.es: ¿Qué es más importante que la amistad?

translation.en: - Is that a trick question? - No.
Literally anything else.
Let me think, a golden chamber pot, a palace made entirely of jade,
translation.es: A ver, una vasija de oro, un palacio de jade,

translation.en: an army of terracotta warriors! Why are you wasting a wish on some girl?
translation.es: un ejército de terracota. ¿Por qué lo desperdiciarás en ella?

translation.en: Oh! That's right.
Sorry, I can't expect you to understand.
translation.es: No puedo esperar que lo entiendas. No te expliqué todo.

translation.en: I haven't explained everything. Down, please.
translation.es: No puedo esperar que lo entiendas. No te expliqué todo. Baja, porfa.

translation.en: Ten years ago, a cool spring day. A gentle breeze.
translation.es: Diez años atrás. Hermoso día de primavera. Brisa.

translation.en: A lonely boy waits after school. Me.
translation.es: Un joven a la salida de la escuela. Yo.

translation.en: Enter the girl, Li Na, throwing dumplings and defending my honor. Then we…
translation.es: Entra la chica, Li Na, defendiendo mi honor.

translation.en: This is really happening. This should be so easy.
translation.es: - Entonces… - Es real, ¿no? Debería ser tan fácil. Tres deseos y listo. Pero no.

translation.en: Three wishes and I'm done. But no, I get stuck with this simpleton.
translation.es: Debería ser tan fácil. Tres deseos y listo. Pero no. Estoy con este simplón.

translation.en: Just look at him with his mindless grin.
So naive. So ignorant.
So stupid.
Why?
What have I done to deserve this?
And then she drove away and I never saw her again.
translation.es: Y luego se fue y nunca la volví a ver.

translation.en: It's okay, Long. I get emotional too just talking about it.
translation.es: Calma, yo también me emociono de solo contarlo.

translation.en: I can't make people fall in love. Why would I make someone your friend?
translation.es: Si no puedo hacer que se enamore, ¿por qué podría hacerla tu amiga?

translation.en: What? No, she's already my friend. I just need to get into the party.
translation.es: No. Ya es mi amiga. Solo necesito entrar a la fiesta.

translation.en: A wish! Why didn't you just say so?
Yeah, I wish to be a princeling.
All right, here we go. Stand back and it shall be so!
translation.es: Muy bien, aquí vamos. ¡Apártate y así será!

translation.en: Done and done. Now, onto that final wish.
What is this?
What? I made you a prince.
No, no, I said princeling.
Like one of those guys with the fancy suit,
the Rolex watch and the chauffeured car, - the personal assistant-- -
translation.es: un Rolex, auto con chofer y el asistente personal…

translation.en: That's like ten different wishes. You have two.
translation.es: Son como diez deseos, solo tienes dos.

translation.en: Fine. How about a temporary version, just for today?
translation.es: Y, ¿una versión temporal solo por hoy?

translation.en: You're seriously going to wish to be rich for 24 hours?
translation.es: ¿En serio quieres ser rico solo 24 horas?

translation.en: I don't care about that.
translation.es: No me importa eso, solo necesito entrar y reconectar con Li Na.

translation.en: I just need to reconnect with Li Na. She won't care if I'm poor.
translation.es: No me importa eso, solo necesito entrar y reconectar con Li Na. No le importará si soy pobre.

translation.en: I'm sorry I'm laughing,
translation.es: Perdón que me ría, es lo más tonto que escuché.

translation.en: but that is the dumbest thing I've ever heard. Of course she'll care.
translation.es: Perdón que me ría, es lo más tonto que escuché. Sí le importará.

translation.en: Yeah, well, it's my wish and not yours.
translation.es: Sí, bueno, es mi deseo y no el tuyo.

translation.en: Shoot me with your magic juice.
Fine, 24 hours.
Perfect!
And the car.
Perfect.
And the personal assistant who has to do everything I ask for the next 24 hours.
translation.es: Y el asistente personal que debe hacer todo lo que pida.

translation.en: Long, you look good as a human. Now, walking can be tricky, but--
translation.es: Luces bien como humano. Caminar no es fácil, pero…

translation.en: Okay, party time.
Oh, uh.
Good afternoon. I'd like to inquire about a customer.
translation.es: Hola. Necesito consultarle sobre un cliente.

translation.en: Follow me.
Oh, yeah. Now, these are my kind of people.
translation.es: Sí. Este es mi tipo de gente.

translation.en: The servants' entrance is around back.
translation.es: La entrada de servicio es por atrás.

translation.en: This is amazing.
Oh, you got in.
- I've never been so humiliated in-- - Coat check, thank you.
translation.es: - Nunca fui tan humillado… - Al guardarropas.

translation.en: There she is.
She looks so…
important.
- Li Na. - It's so good to see you again.
translation.es: - Li Na. - Hola, qué lindo verte.

translation.en: How does it feel to be 19, dear?
Oh, well, I've actually been feeling really confused lately--
Great, dear. What would you say about being the new face of Shin Makeup?
translation.es: Sí, genial. ¿Te gustaría ser la nueva cara de Shin Makeup?

translation.en: Actually, I no longer rep products that use animal testing.
- Where's your father? - Li Na?
I'll have him sign the contract.
- Li Na! - It's so great to see you again!
I want to talk about your future.
I've been thinking about my future.
Inflatable bras, the future of fashion. I want you to be a part.
translation.es: Sostenes inflables. Son lo que viene. Debes ser parte.

translation.en: - Yeah, I'm not sure-- - That's great!
I'll have a shoot scheduled ASAP.
- Happy birthday! - It's so-- Oh, it's you, Buckley.
We're halfway through the list. You're doing great.
translation.es: Solo falta la mitad. Vas muy bien.

translation.en: Yeah, great. Any word from my dad?
He's working hard, just like we are.
So, how about a little bit less of this,
translation.es: ¿Qué tal un poco menos de esto…

translation.en: and more of this!
All right, Din.  Here we go.
Got it. Game face.
- Whoo. Here we go! - Hi, Li Na! Happy--
Hi, it's so great to see you again.
- Oh, i feel that same way. So-- - This is just the greatest day of my life.
translation.es: - Lo mismo digo. - Es el mejor día de mi vida.

translation.en: Uh, wow, you too?
Uh, wait, before I forget, I brought you a little something.
translation.es: Antes de olvidarlo. Te traje un regalo.

translation.en: - Hi, it's so good to see you again. - Actually, we never met.
translation.es: - Hola, qué bueno verte. - No nos conocemos.

translation.en: - If I may? - Hi, it's so great to see you again.
So, how's your best friend?
I… I don't know what happened.
She didn't even recognize me.
Great. Dreams crushed. We're done here, right?
translation.es: El sueño fracasó. Terminamos, ¿no? Necesito dos más.

translation.en: I'll have two to go.
Ladies and gentlemen, time for a treat.
If we could have the birthday girl and her father come to the dance floor…
translation.es: La cumpleañera y su papá a la pista…

translation.en: There she is.
And now her father, Mr. Wang, come to the stage.
translation.es: Y ahora su padre, el señor Wang, al escenario.

translation.en: Calling Mr. Wang!
- Come on, Dad. Don't be shy. - Mr. Wang?
Mr. Wang, come on down!
I'm sure he'll be here any second.
Mr. Wang.
Wang? Do I have the right name?
What kind of father doesn't show up to his daughter's birthday?
translation.es: ¿Qué padre no está en el cumpleaños de su hija?

translation.en: - I know. - Come on.
- We gotta do something. - Mic was on. I apologize.
translation.es: - Sí. - Ven. Debemos hacer algo. Me escucharon, perdón.

translation.en: Ladies and gentlemen, if I could have your attention here.
translation.es: Damas y caballeros, su atención por favor.

translation.en: It's time for the entertainment portion.
translation.es: Es hora del show de la noche.

translation.en: Long, make some smoke. Lights.
From the streets of Shaolin, kung fu like you've never seen it before.
translation.es: De las calles de Shaolin, kung fu como nunca lo han visto.

translation.en: Introducing the great master!
Trained in the art of Dragon Style.
Now, everyone, keep your eyes on the stage as I…
Uh, that's it. Show's over. Thank you, folks. Bye!
Personal assistant. Never been so insulted.
translation.es: Asistente personal. Nunca me sentí tan insultado.

translation.en: Lucky number eight!
Sir, caviar crème anglaise amuse- bouche?
You don't have any, uh, shrimp chips, do you?
Uh, no.
Oh, no.
What's a man like you doing all by himself?
translation.es: ¿Qué hace solo un hombre como tú?

translation.en: So true. Who needs wine when you have good company?
translation.es: Sí. ¿Quién necesita vino con tan buena compañía?

translation.en: I believe you've misunder--
I don't normally move this fast, but…
translation.es: No suelo ir tan rápido, pero…

translation.en: Sorry, must run.
Hello…
Li Na?
Oh, handsome?
Playing hard to get, I see.
translation.es: Veo que te haces el difícil.

translation.en: Water. Water. I just need water.
Refreshing.
Where's that kid?
Hello?
- Li Na, is that you? - Go away. I'm busy.
translation.es: - Li Na, ¿eres tú? - Vete. Estoy ocupada.

translation.en: Ah, yeah, I can see you're busy. Yes, very busy.
translation.es: - Sí, veo que estás muy ocupada. - Exacto.

translation.en: Okay, I… I just…
I'm the one who did that whole kung fu thing.
translation.es: Soy el que hizo esa actuación de kung fu.

translation.en: I was just trying to…
I know what you were trying to do.
Thanks.
Are you okay?
Yeah.
I'm fine.
Here, take this.
Thank you.
Just… just one night out of the whole year,
translation.es: Es que… Pensé que por lo menos una noche

translation.en: I thought maybe he could make time.
translation.es: Pensé que por lo menos una noche se haría el tiempo.

translation.en: I don't know why I'm letting it get to me.
I'm sorry.
This is so embarrassing. I don't normally cry like this.
translation.es: Esto es muy vergonzoso. No suelo llorar así.

translation.en: Here, you got a little something on your face.
translation.es: Permíteme, tienes algo en la cara.

translation.en: Yeah, it's not really coming off.
I'm sorry. I must look totally crazy.
No, no.
I just… don't know what else to do.
translation.es: Es que… no sé qué más hacer.

translation.en: It's like, I can see my whole life laid out ahead of me,
translation.es: Es como si pudiera ver mi vida por delante

translation.en: and I'm trying my best, trying to make everyone proud,
translation.es: y me esfuerzo por enorgullecer a todos,

translation.en: but… no matter how hard I try, I just feel like…
translation.es: pero no importa cuánto lo intente,

translation.en: Like…
Something is missing.
Exactly.
There you are, snake eyes.
I'm sorry, do I--
Oh, jeez, are you okay?
I'm fine.
Here.
Thanks.
I'm sorry for being so rude. I don't think I got your name earlier.
translation.es: Perdón si fui grosera. No me dijiste tu nombre, ¿no?

translation.en: Have we met before?
Um, well, actually…
I'm--
There you are. Miss Wang, thank goodness.
translation.es: Ahí está, señorita Wang, menos mal.

translation.en: Just in time. Your father will be here any second.
translation.es: La encontré a tiempo. Su papá aparecerá pronto.

translation.en: - He made it? - Uh, yes.
Li Na! There you are.
- Oh. Hi, Dad. - Buckley informs me the party was perfect.
translation.es: Hola, papá. Oí que la fiesta fue perfecta.

translation.en: Oh! Uh, yes, it was.
- Thank you, Dad. - You had a good time?
Yes, of course. I spoke to everyone you wanted me to
translation.es: Sí. Hablé con los que me pediste

translation.en: and I think I was able to make some really important… connections.
translation.es: y creo que pude hacer buenos… contactos.

translation.en: Hello? Hello? Ah, there we go.
Here, I brought you something special.
- Here you are. - Go ahead. Open it!
I had to send my assistant to half the jewelers in Shanghai.
translation.es: Mi asistente recorrió medio Shanghái para conseguirlo.

translation.en: It's true.
- I know you appreciate something special. - Oh, of course.
translation.es: Sé que te gustará. Por supuesto, tanto como el del año pasado.

translation.en: Just as much as last year.
translation.es: Por supuesto, tanto como el del año pasado.

translation.en: Thank you, Dad.
Oh, uh, did I? Na Na, I'm sorry. You know, I--
translation.es: ¿En serio? Na Na, lo siento. Es que…

translation.en: Well, you can never have too much of a good thing, right?
translation.es: Cuando algo es bueno, nunca está de más, ¿no?

translation.en: Excuse me, I… I didn't see you there, young man.
Allow me to get you a closer look, sir.
Here you are.
Good quality leather, excellent suit, Rolex.
And what's the family business?
Uh, dumplings!
I mean, Dumpling House. I mean, restaurants in general.
translation.es: Digo, Casa del Dumpling. No, restaurantes en general.

translation.en: All of them.
Ah, a young man of means, I see. Reminds me of myself.
translation.es: Un joven con recursos. Me recuerdas a mí.

translation.en: You two should have lunch.
- Dad! - Uh, yes.
- Of course. I'd love that. - Excellent.
Let's have arrangements made. Forgive my manners.
translation.es: Lo organizaré. Disculpa mis modales, muchacho.

translation.en: I didn't get your name.
Oh, I'm…
- Dan. - Pleasure to meet you, Dan.
Where would you like to go?
The Pearl Tower's excellent. I have a reservation--
translation.es: La Torre Perla es excelente. Tengo reservas.

translation.en: - Excuse me, sir. A very important call. - Just give me a few minutes.
translation.es: - Señor, tiene una llamada. - Que espere un momento.

translation.en: Sir, they said they need to talk now.
Put them on.
Good evening, sorry to keep you waiting.
So, um, would you really like to--
Yes. Yeah.
See you tomorrow, Dan.
We talked and it was just like old times.
translation.es: Fue como en los viejos tiempos.

translation.en: We made arrangements to have lunch. Can you believe it?
translation.es: Mañana vamos a almorzar, es increíble.

translation.en: I can't believe you didn't explain what a toilet is.
translation.es: ¡No me dijiste lo que es un baño!

translation.en: Everything is going to plan!
Oh, really, Dan.
Uh, I'll come clean when the time's right.
translation.es: Se lo diré cuando sea el momento.

translation.en: You're not gonna, because there is no right time.
translation.es: No lo harás porque no habrá momento.

translation.en: You're the peasant, she's the princess.
translation.es: Sí, ella es la princesa, y tú no.

translation.en: Tale as old as time. And we all know how that ends.
translation.es: Es un clásico. Y sabemos cómo termina.

translation.en: - Good? - No, not good. Terribly. Horribly!
Long, we have a special bond that runs deeper than money or status.
translation.es: Tenemos un vínculo más fuerte que el dinero.

translation.en: Why'd you lie? Well, I… uh…
I'll tell you.
Because the minute Li Na finds out who you are, this will all fall apart.
translation.es: En cuanto Li Na sepa quién eres, todo se desmoronará.

translation.en: You should learn to have faith in humanity.
translation.es: Deberías tener fe en la humanidad.

translation.en: I've been around for 1,000 years. I know how humans work. Not you.
translation.es: ¿Tener fe? Los conozco hace mil años, no como tú.

translation.en: - Poor Long. I see your problem. - You're my problem.
translation.es: - Pobre Long. Sé cuál es tu problema. - Tú.

translation.en: I wouldn't expect your tiny, reptilian brain to understand the power of human friendship.
translation.es: Está bien, tu cerebro de reptil no entiende el poder de la amistad.

translation.en: It's okay. I'll be your first and only friend. Come here.
translation.es: Está bien, tu cerebro de reptil no entiende el poder de la amistad. Seré tu primer y único amigo.

translation.en: I had a million friends when I was human. Oh, no.
translation.es: Tenía amigos cuando era humano. ¡Ay, no!

translation.en: Long, - were you a-- - Yes, yes, I was human.
translation.es: - Long, eras un… - Sí, fui humano.

translation.en: For heaven's sake, have you even looked at the teapot?
translation.es: Por Dios, ¿alguna vez miraste la tetera?

translation.en: And I was the best human ever!
translation.es: ¡Y fui el mejor humano del mundo!

translation.en: One of the most beloved, respected lords in history! You know why?
translation.es: Uno de los más respetados de la historia. ¿Y sabes por qué?

translation.en: - You had a lot of friends? - No!
I had all the wealth and land and power, and everyone loved me for it.
translation.es: Tenía riqueza, tierras y poder, y me amaban por eso.

translation.en: Wait, if you're so great, why haven't I heard of you?
translation.es: ¿Y por qué nunca oí sobre ti?

translation.en: We-- Well, obviously some jealous rival took credit for everything after I died.
translation.es: Un rival envidioso se llevó el crédito por todo cuando morí.

translation.en: You died. The heavens made you a Wish Dragon?
translation.es: ¿Y te convirtieron en un dragón de los deseos?

translation.en: Yes, as a reward.
- You don't seem happy. - I'm very happy.
translation.es: - No pareces muy feliz. - Lo estoy.

translation.en: So, if you would just use your last wish, and wish for the same thing as every other master,
translation.es: Así que, si usaras tu último deseo y desearas lo mismo que todos,

translation.en: then I can be done and leave this wretched world.
translation.es: podría terminar y dejar este mundo de una vez.

translation.en: And finally return back to heaven,
translation.es: Y, por fin, volver al cielo,

translation.en: where everyone is waiting to welcome the great emperor home with a parade.
translation.es: donde esperan al gran emperador con un enorme desfile.

translation.en: They have parades in heaven?
My point is there's a simple solution to every problem in the world.
translation.es: El punto es que hay una solución para todo.

translation.en: Including yours. Use it.
So, that's what you've learned after all these years?
Yes.
Crap, ten o'clock? My mom's getting off work.
Long, we gotta go! Hurry! Let's go!
Sir, surely you can extend the loan one more week.
translation.es: Seguro puede extender el plazo una semana más.

translation.en: I promise, I can pay you back, sir.
Foreclosure? Please, sir. I'm begging you.
This company is my life's work. I have a family and a respons--
translation.es: Esta compañía es mi vida. Tengo una familia…

translation.en: - Is everything all right, sir? - It's fine.
Just…
just don't tell Li Na about any of this.
translation.es: no le digas nada a Li Na.

translation.en: Well, have you found it?
We've located the boy's apartment, sir.
Yes, and?
There's no way he can come or go without being caught.
translation.es: No podrá entrar ni salir sin que lo atrapemos.

translation.en: Good.
Okay, in the teapot. Everything's normal.
translation.es: Entra en la tetera. Todo es normal.

translation.en: - Lights on. - Think you can bring Li Na to this dump?
Quiet, you! Homework out.
Her fridge is bigger than this apartment. If you're not gonna say something helpful, don't say anything.
translation.es: - Su refrigerador es más grande que esto. - Si no ayudarás, no digas nada.

translation.en: She's here!
Uh, your suit.
Huh? Oh, no!
Din, I brought you some…
Hello, Mother. Sure is hot out tonight, isn't it?
No, it's freezing. You coming down with something?
translation.es: No, hace mucho frío. ¿Te pasa algo?

translation.en: Oh, no. Just… studying.
Okay. Here.
- I'll heat you up some leftovers. - Li Na will love leftovers.
translation.es: - Te calentaré las sobras. - A Li Na le encantarán.

translation.en: - Hey, stop it! - Stop what?
Uh, stop worrying about me. I'm fine.
translation.es: Ya deja de preocuparte por mí. Estoy bien.

translation.en: You don't seem fine.
- How was school? - Great. School was great.
You lie to everyone, not just yourself.
translation.es: No te mientes solo a ti.

translation.en: - Leave me alone. - Fine.
No, Mom. I was just…
- You know where to find me. - …talking to somebody else.
translation.es: - Sabes dónde encontrarme. - …hablaba con otra persona.

translation.en: Din, I'm going to ask you a question.
Remember, I'm your mother.
You can tell me the truth.
Are you…
drinking alcohol?
- No. Gimme that! I'm not drinking. - Where are you hiding it?
Don't lie to me! Staying out late! Skipping school!
translation.es: ¡Mientes! Vuelves tarde, no vas a clase.

translation.en: - You're acting crazy all the time. - Mom!
I am your mother! I know when something is wrong.
translation.es: Soy tu mamá. Sé que algo pasa.

translation.en: - What is it? - Nothing is wrong!
Just tell me the truth. Whatever it is, I can help.
Mom, you can't.
Believe me.
You can't.
Go to your room. Don't come out if you're going to disrespect me.
translation.es: ¡A tu cuarto! Y no salgas si me vas a faltar el respeto.

translation.en: - I wasn't-- - Go!
Fine!
I hate this place.
- They're really going at it. - Bring that chair.
Popcorn, anyone?
I can hear you.
Din.
Here.
You…
you need a real dinner.
Thanks.
Sorry, Mom.
Hey, little buddy. You're so cute. You have family? Are you hungry?
You're such a cute, fluffy, little, hairy- faced…
translation.es: Eres tan lindo, bolita de pelos.

translation.en: - It's him! Wake up! - Huh? Huh?
- Hey, boss! Boss! - Hey, boss!
- Boss! - The boy!
Impossible.
Okay, Din. You can do this.
Just tell her the truth.
- - Good evening, sir.
- Oh, hey, Dan! - Hey!
- Sir, may I take your jacket? - My jacket? I just got this.
translation.es: - Señor, ¿me permite su saco? - ¿Mi saco? Es nuevo.

translation.en: Good one, Dan.
Yeah, good one. Sure. I have plenty more of these at home.
translation.es: Claro. No hay problema. Tengo muchos más en casa.

translation.en: - Thank you. Here you are. - Here.
Sorry about all the fuss. My dad insists on only the best.
translation.es: Perdón por el alboroto. Mi papá insiste en solo lo mejor.

translation.en: Actually, Li Na, there's something I need to tell you.
translation.es: Li Na, tengo que decirte algo.

translation.en: I know what you're gonna say.
- You do? - Yes.
It's so nice to meet someone from a respectable family that you enjoy talking to, right?
translation.es: Qué bueno conocer a alguien divertido y de familia respetable, ¿no?

translation.en: - Oh. - Madame, your table is ready.
Right. Respectable.
Long, I'm supposed to be from a respectable family.
translation.es: Long, soy de una familia respetable.

translation.en: No. What? I'm shocked. I'm stunned.
- It's exactly what I predicted. - I need your help.
translation.es: Sí, es lo que predije. Ayúdame. Eras de la realeza. Dime qué hacer.

translation.en: You were from royalty. Tell me what to do.
translation.es: Ayúdame. Eras de la realeza. Dime qué hacer.

translation.en: Fine. Do exactly what I say.
translation.es: Pero haz todo lo que digo.

translation.en: - Okay. Deal. - Sir, could I offer you a hot tow--
You shouldn't let commoners talk to you.
translation.es: No dejes que los plebeyos te hablen.

translation.en: - Really? - Sir, I just--
wanted to offer you a hot towel.
translation.es: quería… ofrecerle… una toalla… ca… lien… te.

translation.en: Sir, you just--
Madame, your table.
Demand another table, claiming it's far superior.
Li Na, this table simply won't do. Allow me to show you another one.
translation.es: Li Na, esta mesa no me gusta. Te mostraré otra.

translation.en: This is the table for the hors d'oeuvres.
translation.es: Dan, es la mesa de los hors d'oeuvres.

translation.en: Well, you tell Mr. and Mrs. Hors D'oeuvres that this is our table.
translation.es: Dígale a los Hors D'oeuvres que esta es nuestra mesa.

translation.en: Dan, you're such a funny guy.
Funny? Uh, are you sure you didn't mean suave, classy, respectable.
translation.es: ¿Gracioso? ¿No quisiste decir elegante, con clase, respetable?

translation.en: You're too good. I'm gonna cry.
I would have her executed for mocking royalty.
translation.es: La ejecutaría por burlarse de la realeza.

translation.en: I appreciate you trying to make this place interesting, but how about somewhere else?
translation.es: Me gusta que quieras que sea más divertido, pero ¿vamos a otro lado?

translation.en: Somewhere else? Like more fancy than this?
Not good enough?
- Well played, child. - No, like, a walk or something.
translation.es: ¿No es suficiente? Buena jugada. No, a caminar o algo.

translation.en: May I take your order?
- Spare no expense. Money's no object. - One of everything.
translation.es: - No repares en gastos. - Sí, uno de cada.

translation.en: Sir, there are over 600 items on our menu.
- Better make that three. - Good!
As you wish, sir.
So, listen, Dan, about last night, sorry for acting so weird.
translation.es: Escucha, Dan, perdón por actuar tan raro anoche.

translation.en: To be honest, it's nice to have someone who listened.
translation.es: Para ser sincera, es lindo sentirme escuchada.

translation.en: Ignore her and she's yours.
Look. Rich people never pay attention to anyone else.
translation.es: Mira alrededor. Los ricos no prestan atención.

translation.en: All they talk about is their own business, how much money they make.
translation.es: Solo hablan de sus negocios y su dinero.

translation.en: - It's almost an art form. - Are you listening to anything I said?
translation.es: - Es casi artístico. - ¿Escuchaste algo de lo que dije?

translation.en: Not a word.
Um, okay, well, I was saying it was really nice to talk to you…
translation.es: Decía que fue muy lindo hablar contigo porque…

translation.en: We're close, Din. Tell her how many palaces you own.
translation.es: Ya casi. Dile cuántos palacios tienes.

translation.en: Let me stop you. Did I tell you just how respectable my family is?
translation.es: Déjame detenerte. ¿Te hablé de lo respetable que es mi familia?

translation.en: - Your first entree. - Thanks. Uh- uh- uh.
For nothing.
Dan! You know what?
- You're just not who I thought you were. - Wait, Li Na.
translation.es: No eres lo que creí. Espera, Li Na.

translation.en: I don't understand. That worked on all 17 of my wives.
translation.es: No entiendo. Funcionó con mis 17 esposas.

translation.en: - I can explain. - What now?
I, uh…
We should… We should go for that walk.
translation.es: Deberíamos… dar ese paseo que sugeriste.

translation.en: Maybe a run!
Bon appetit!
Surprise!
Hop on.
Fine.
Who were those men?
Gangsters. Probably out to kidnap us for a ransom.
- Come on. This way. -
Oh, no.
You've always wanted to be in a street fight.
- Help. - No!
- Stay calm. - Come on, please.
- Dan? -
Look what I found!
Look at me. How did I become a piñata?
- I think we lost them. - Good.
So, when exactly were you going to apologize, Dan?
I…
The other way! Other way!
Li Na, I really do want to say I'm sorry.
translation.es: Li Na, de verdad quiero disculparme.

translation.en: Sorry for what exactly?
Sorry for acting like such a jerk. Apology accepted.
translation.es: - Por actuar como un idiota. - Disculpa aceptada.

translation.en: Now, get him, Dan. Kick him right in his stupid face!
Kick him!
Hand over the teapot, kid.
I didn't sign up for this. If you made your last wish, we-- Oh, no.
translation.es: No acepté esto. Si pidieras tu último deseo… ¡No!

translation.en: This literally could not get any wo--
- Good one. - Ah. Thanks. Eat metal, dirt bag!
How do you like them apples, huh?
Crap!
Incoming!
Trust me.
- Li Na, I think we're gonna have to-- - Jump!
Don't worry. We got this.
Oh, no!
Oh, my God!
You know what, Dan? This is turning into a pretty good date.
translation.es: ¿Sabes, Dan? Al final es una buena cita.

translation.en: Oh, no!
- Are you okay? - I think so.
I'm fine. Thank you for asking.
Oh, boy.
What happened?
Time's up, Dan.
What happened? Well, we jumped off a building.
We almost died.
- Your 24 hours are over. - We beat up some gangsters.
- No. - Okay, that was mostly you. You gotta teach me some of that kung fu.
translation.es: - No. - Bueno, tú lo hiciste. Enséñame kung fu.

translation.en: Reflexes.
Wait, what happened to your suit?
Look, Li Na.
There's… something I need to tell you.
You have one more wish. You don't have to do this.
translation.es: Te queda un deseo. No lo hagas.

translation.en: My real name isn't Dan.
It's…
Din.
You're Din.
I'm sorry.
But… why did you lie?
I wasn't planning to. I just…
I was worried that if you found out it was, well, just me,
translation.es: Me preocupaba que, si descubrías quién era, o sea yo,

translation.en: everything would end.
So, you still live around here?
Yeah.
In that same old shikumen?
Yeah.
I told you this wouldn't end well.
Wait. I remember this alley.
We used to take a shortcut through here on the way home from school.
translation.es: Solíamos tomar este atajo a la salida de la escuela.

translation.en: Uh, yeah.
And Mrs. Chu would sell those roasted yams.
translation.es: Y la señora Chu vendía batatas asadas.

translation.en: Hey, look at that! It's Mrs. Chu!
Hi, Mrs. Chu. It's Li Na Wang. - Do you remember-- - One buck, two yams. No bargaining!
translation.es: - Hola. Soy Li Na Wang. ¿Me recuerda? - Un dólar, sin regatear.

translation.en: - Some things never change. - Here.
Sold! Next.
- Ow, ow. - Move!
So good!
Hold on, is that…
No way!
Yeah, new decade, same sweatpants!
translation.es: Diez años después, los mismos pantalones.

translation.en: Hey, Din, what do you think about a little race?
- Three, two, one, go! - What?
Hey!
Okay.
Not fair.
So, your old apartment has to be right around the corner.
translation.es: Tu apartamento debe estar a la vuelta de la esquina.

translation.en: Oh, I don't know if that's such a good idea.
translation.es: No sé si sea buena idea.

translation.en: - Hey Weijing, you have any green onions? - Hi, Mrs. Song.
I'm sorry. Do I know you?
Hey, Mom. So, uh, surprise!
We have an unexpected visitor.
A girl? That's why you're acting crazy?
All this time worried you were drugged out in some internet cafe. It was a girl.
translation.es: - ¿Una chica? ¿Por eso actuabas así? - ¡No! Y yo preocupada porque te estuvieras drogando por ahí.

translation.en: - It's Li Na! - Just a--
Hi.
Li Na? What are you doing here?
Just visiting an old friend.
translation.es: Vine a visitar a un viejo amigo.

translation.en: Well, where are my manners? Come in.
You and I are not finished.
- She's so pretty now. - Like a princess.
translation.es: - Es tan bonita. - Como una princesa.

translation.en: Well, her nose is a little flat.
Start with this.
- You really shouldn't go to-- - You're skinnier than a broom handle.
translation.es: - No debería hacer… - Estás muy delgada.

translation.en: - I wasn't expecting-- - Li Na!
translation.es: - Lo siento, no quería… - Li Na.

translation.en: Did you know Din puts flowers on Clucky's grave every year?
translation.es: ¿Sabías que Din aún le lleva flores a Clueca?

translation.en: Mr. Huang, cut it out.
I did not know that.
He's so cute. He even cries a little.
I am not crying. I am mourning.
- He even brings flowers. - A tiny bouquet!
Come in.
What? You're saying that's not my son?
You knew. Don't lie to me.
You were lying to me this whole time.
You just wanted to inherit my dad's business.
translation.es: Querías heredar la empresa de mi papá.

translation.en: - Right. I will. - I know what you did!
translation.es: - Sí. Y lo haré. - ¡Sé lo que hiciste! No me engañarás.

translation.en: You think you can fool me? I saw you with that guy.
translation.es: - Sí. Y lo haré. - ¡Sé lo que hiciste! No me engañarás. Te vi con ese hombre.

translation.en: You have no idea.
I should've listened to my mother.
- I am your mother. - No!
Here.
Oh, wow. Oh! It's like a time machine up here.
translation.es: - Es como una máquina del tiempo. - Sí, perdón.

translation.en: Yeah, sorry. This is the only place I can get peace and quiet.
translation.es: - Es como una máquina del tiempo. - Sí, perdón. Aquí tengo paz y tranquilidad.

translation.en: You'll never have peace.
Because the ghost of Clucky will always haunt you!
translation.es: El espíritu de Clueca te perseguirá por siempre.

translation.en: - - No, Clucky! You're dead.
Are you gonna cry? Are we gonna see tears now?
I regret nothing. You were delicious. You're gonna know what regret tastes like.
translation.es: - No me arrepiento. - Conocerás el sabor del arrepentimiento.

translation.en: Get away from me, you ghost chicken.
- Why did you eat me? - It was Li Na. She made me do it.
translation.es: - ¿Por qué me comiste? - Li Na me obligó.

translation.en: Selling me out.
- That's cold. - It was your idea.
Yeah. I guess we had a lot of crazy ideas back then.
Yeah.
Here.
Hey, do you remember that promise we made?
- The pinky-- - Of course!
How'd it go? Um…
Friends forever, day by…
Year by year,
upon this we will always…
swear.
- God! - Are you okay?
I'm fine. I'm fine.
Sorry, I wasn't expecting my own giant face.
translation.es: Lo siento, no esperaba ver mi cara en gigante.

translation.en: So embarrassing.
Don't be embarrassed. When I first saw that, I almost fell over.
translation.es: Cuando vi ese cartel, casi me caigo también.

translation.en: But it's been nice. Kind of like you were back.
translation.es: Pero fue lindo, como si hubieras vuelto.

translation.en: But, you know, giant and glowing, and super glamorous.
Doesn't hold a candle to the real thing, though.
translation.es: Pero no se compara con tenerte aquí.

translation.en: What do you say we go for a real date?
No Dan or any of that.
translation.es: Nada de Dan ni esas cosas.

translation.en: I…
Sorry.
Where have you been? The shoot starts in an hour!
What happened to your hair? I'm sending a car!
Din… I had a really wonderful time tonight,
translation.es: Din, la pasé muy bien esta noche,

translation.en: but I have to go.
- Thanks for letting me borrow this. - Keep it till next time.
translation.es: - Gracias por el abrigo. - Quédatelo hasta la próxima.

translation.en: No, really, I--
Not like I'm not gonna see you for another…
translation.es: No es como que no nos veremos de nuevo…

translation.en: …ten years.
Din, the truth is, I have this whole other life now.
translation.es: Din, la verdad es que ahora tengo otra vida.

translation.en: You know? A career.
A future that my dad worked really hard for.
translation.es: Un futuro por el que mi papá trabajó mucho.

translation.en: Certain expectations I have to meet.
Let me guess.
I don't meet those expectations.
I…
You don't understand.
I… I'm just trying to be…
realistic.
I'm sorry.
Hey, Din.
Did you know that shrimp chips don't actually have any shrimp in the ingredients?
translation.es: ¿Sabías que los chips de camarón no tienen camarón?

translation.en: Okay.
Din…
…things are simpler when you're children.
translation.es: Las cosas son más simples en la infancia.

translation.en: But you're older now.
And, well,
you have to be realistic.
Din.
Good news, Long. You can finally be rid of me.
translation.es: Buenas noticias, Long. Por fin puedes deshacerte de mí.

translation.en: I'm ready for my third wish.
You are?
Make me rich. Piles of gold. However you do it.
translation.es: Hazme rico. Dame un montón de oro o lo que sea.

translation.en: - But-- - I thought it wouldn't matter. That she wouldn't care.
translation.es: - Pero… - Pensé que no le importaría.

translation.en: That was stupid.
Give me the gold, and I can have some of that good life.
translation.es: Dame el oro para tener una buena vida.

translation.en: People will treat me with respect.
translation.es: Y así me van a respetar.

translation.en: Heck, I'm sure everyone will want to be my friend then.
Din…
Are you sure?
Am I sure? You've been telling me to make this wish since we met.
translation.es: ¿Si estoy seguro? Tú me insististe con ese deseo.

translation.en: Well, you were right. Okay? I was wrong.
There you go, that's my wish.
Just grant it, and you can go back to your spirit world and your stupid parade in the sky.
translation.es: Concédemelo y podrás regresar al cielo y a tu gran desfile.

translation.en: Just grant the wish, Long.
What?
Din, I'll grant your wish.
But first, there's something I need to show you.
You found the boy. Where is he?
- At the Pearl Tower, sir. - Yeah, with a girl.
translation.es: - En la Torre Perla. - Con una chica.

translation.en: - But I'm afraid he escaped again. - What? How?
Hey, that doesn't belong to you.
Listen to me. I am out of time. I need--
translation.es: Oigan, ya no tengo tiempo. Necesito…

translation.en: - Li Na! Aren't you supposed to be at-- - I'm sorry, Dad. We really need to talk.
translation.es: - Li Na, ¿no deberías estar…? - Lo siento. Debemos hablar.

translation.en: Of course.
- I'm just on a very important call. - Dad.
translation.es: - Estoy en una llamada importante. - Papá.

translation.en: Please.
Sir.
Do you remember when we lived in that old shikumen?
- I know we didn't have much but-- - Don't worry, Li Na. We'll never go back to that life.
translation.es: - No teníamos mucho, pero… - Tranquila. Jamás volveremos a esa vida.

translation.en: But, Dad, don't you ever miss those days?
Wha-- Where is all this coming from?
That… that young man last night, the one you arranged a date with,
translation.es: Ese joven de anoche, con quien hoy tuve una cita,

translation.en: that was Din.
From our old neighborhood?
Yes.
And he's the one who took you to the Pearl Tower.
translation.es: Y él te llevó a la Torre Perla.

translation.en: Yes, and I know what you'll say. You'll tell me to stay away and to leave that old world behind,
translation.es: Sí, y sé que me dirás que me aleje y olvide ese pasado,

translation.en: but the truth is, I think we might be happier if--
translation.es: pero, la verdad, creo que seríamos más felices…

translation.en: Li Na, everything's going to be all right. I'm gonna go talk with Din.
translation.es: Todo va a estar bien. Hablaré con Din.

translation.en: - What? - Bring the van in two minutes.
Dad, are you okay?
- What's going on? - Don't worry.
I'm going to fix everything.
Dad.
Long?
Where are you going?
What is this place?
- Whoa. - This was my home.
I was born into royalty.
I learned from a young age that gold is power.
translation.es: Aprendí desde joven que el oro es poder.

translation.en: So, I set my sights on expanding my fortune and let nothing stand in my way.
translation.es: Así que me propuse expandir mi fortuna y que nada se interpusiera en mi camino.

translation.en: My subjects were loyal…
…and worked tirelessly year after year.
translation.es: y trabajaban incansablemente año tras año.

translation.en: My daughters were married to the finest families,
translation.es: Mis hijas se casaron con las mejores familias

translation.en: to expand the kingdom's glory.
translation.es: para expandir la gloria del reino.

translation.en: And my son, I sent off to win treasure.
translation.es: Y a mi hijo lo envié a ganar un tesoro.

translation.en: He came home a hero.
Soon, I had more gold, more land,
translation.es: Pronto, tuve más oro, más tierra

translation.en: and more monuments than any lord who had come before me.
translation.es: y más monumentos que cualquier otro lord.

translation.en: And yet,
as I laid on my deathbed,
I awaited the parade of loyal subjects and loving family.
translation.es: esperé el desfile de todos los que me querían.

translation.en: But there was none.
With my last breath, I cursed all who had forgotten me.
translation.es: Con mi último aliento, maldije a los que me habían olvidado.

translation.en: I arrived at the gates to the spirit world and awaited a great procession to welcome me.
translation.es: Llegué al mundo espiritual y esperé un gran recibimiento.

translation.en: I demand you open this!
Instead, the gods transformed me into a Wish Dragon.
translation.es: Pero los dioses me transformaron en un dragón de los deseos.

translation.en: Not as a reward, but as a punishment.
translation.es: No como recompensa, sino como castigo.

translation.en: I was imprisoned and sent down to Earth
to serve ten masters and learn the true meaning of life.
translation.es: para servir a diez amos y entender el sentido de la vida.

translation.en: And to be honest, all these years, all these masters,
translation.es: Y, para ser sincero, después de tantos años y amos,

translation.en: I have been failing.
Until I met you.
I don't know the meaning of life. But the things you care about,
translation.es: No sé el sentido de la vida, pero lo que a ti te importa, tus amigos y tu familia,

translation.en: your friends, your family,
translation.es: pero lo que a ti te importa, tus amigos y tu familia,

translation.en: are worth more than anything I ever possessed.
translation.es: valen más que cualquier cosa que tuve.

translation.en: And no amount of gold can ever buy that.
translation.es: Y no hay oro que pueda comprar eso.

translation.en: It's your wish, Din.
Make sure it's what you really want.
translation.es: Pero asegúrate de que sea sincero.

translation.en: I…
Din.
Mr. Wang? What are you doing here?
Please, give me that. I don't have time for any more games.
translation.es: Dame la tetera. No tengo tiempo para tus juegos.

translation.en: They work for you? No one's going to get hurt, but I need those--
translation.es: - ¿Trabajan para usted? - Nadie saldrá herido, pero dame…

translation.en: Long!
Stay away from my friend.
Finally, I'm saved.
What's wrong with you? I told you not to hurt the kid.
translation.es: ¿Qué haces? Dije que no lo lastimaras.

translation.en: I've been bowing to others my entire life.
And now, everyone will bow to me.
translation.es: Ahora es momento de que cumplan las mías.

translation.en: No! No! No! No!
- Mr. Wang. - Dragon, I summon you.
Din, Din!
I'm your master now.
And I know my first wish.
Dad?
No! Oh, my God. What happened to you?
- Din! - Get in the teapot.
Dad!
- Li Na. - No, no, no.
Call an ambulance! You're gonna be okay.
Li Na, listen to me.
I'm sorry.
I tried to save it, but the business is bankrupt.
translation.es: Traté de salvarla, pero la empresa está en quiebra.

translation.en: I wanted you to have everything.
And now, I've left you with nothing.
translation.es: Y ahora… te dejé sin nada.

translation.en: No.
I never needed any of that.
All I ever wanted was my dad.
All I wanted was you.
One touch and you're done, kid.
Yeah, get him, boss. Touch him. Touch him good.
Ooh, sparks.
Long, I summon you.
Din!
Uh, dragon guy? I summon you.
Din! Din?
- - Din!
I wish for enough puppies to open a pet store.
translation.es: Deseo cachorros para abrir una tienda de mascotas.

translation.en: Puppies? Yes, puppies!
It shall be so!
Hey, little fella! I'll name you Teddy.
No, bad Teddy! Bad boy!
Hey, boss! I got the teapot!
Don't let the boy get it!
translation.es: Que el chico no la agarre.

translation.en: - Help us! Summon the dragon! - Wish for something! A gun, anything!
translation.es: ¡Invoca al dragón! Pide un deseo. ¡Un arma, algo!

translation.en: Wish? Dragon? Summon?
- Dragon guy. - Huh?
I wish I had longer legs.
Um, okay.
Are you joking?
I summon you!
I command you to throw this kid off.
I cannot intervene. You're not my master until you have sole possession.
translation.es: No puedo. No eres mi amo hasta que tengas la tetera.

translation.en: - Let it go. - No.
Let it go!
Long, Long, I can't see you!
There's no need to die tonight, kid. Come work for me.
translation.es: No necesitas morir aún. Trabaja para mí. Te daré todo el oro que quieras.

translation.en: I'll give you all the gold you want.
translation.es: Trabaja para mí. Te daré todo el oro que quieras.

translation.en: - We're both wishing for the same thing. - No.
No, we're not.
I don't need gold.
I have something more important to wish for.
Din.
I need that teapot.
Well, at least you'll make a good statue in my office.
translation.es: Al menos, serás una estatua en mi oficina.

translation.en: No!
Long?
Long, no!
No!
Long!
Long!
Din.
What's happening?
Welcome, LongZhu.
- What's going on? Where am I? - Congratulations.
Your service as a Wish Dragon is complete.
translation.es: Completaste tu servicio como dragón de los deseos.

translation.en: Complete? I haven't finished. I haven't finished my tenth master.
translation.es: Pero no, no he terminado. Mi décimo amo no terminó.

translation.en: You have put the needs of another before yourself
and shown us that you understand the meaning of life.
translation.es: por lo que entiendes el sentido de la vida.

translation.en: You are now free to enter the spirit world.
translation.es: Ahora puedes entrar al mundo espiritual.

translation.en: Is that a…
parade?
In your honor.
No, I can't! I have to go back.
Back?
Turn me back into a Wish Dragon! I have one more wish to grant.
Ridiculous. The laws of heaven forbid it.
translation.es: Es ridículo. Las leyes del cielo lo prohíben.

translation.en: You're ridiculous! Old man in a skirt.
- This isn't a skirt! - Send me back!
You dare reject the will of the gods?
Fine. If you're not gonna send me back, I'll go myself!
translation.es: Si no me regresarás, iré yo mismo.

translation.en: - Stop that! - Stupid clouds.
Stop… stop that this instant! Ah! My friend needs me.
Fine!
We will permit you to return.
But only under one condition.
Long!
Your final wish,
great master.
I wish…
Dad? Dad!
There you are, Maurice. Here we got Pocket and Mr. Pants.
translation.es: Ahí estás, Maurice. Tenemos a Bolsillos y Pantalón.

translation.en: And all 234.
Wow, nice puppies.
Nice legs.
- Thanks. Toodles. - Bye!
Din, I…
When I said that you needed to be more realistic, I didn't mean that--
translation.es: Cuando dije que debías ser más realista, no quise…

translation.en: It's okay, Mom.
I…
I'm sorry I can't give you a better life.
translation.es: por no darte una vida mejor.

translation.en: You've given me a lot, Mom.
Everything that matters.
Well…
it's late and, uh, we should have dinner.
- Here. -
Mr. Wang?
- What are you doing? - Is Din all right?
Din, what trouble have you started now?
No, no. No trouble at all.
I just came to apologize.
I know what you did.
Thank you.
Ah, well, where are my manners? Sit, sit, sit!
- We were about to have dinner. - You don't have to.
translation.es: - Estábamos por cenar. - No es necesario.

translation.en: Nonsense. Nonsense. It's my pleasure.
And besides, we haven't had guests in, well, a couple hours!
translation.es: Y, además, no hemos tenido invitados en unas horas.

translation.en: They're much too young to be holding hands.
translation.es: Son muy jóvenes para tomarse de la mano.

translation.en: Shut up!
Here, you look like you could use a good, home- cooked meal.
translation.es: Parece que necesitas una rica comida casera.

translation.en: This is the most delicious soup I've ever tasted.
translation.es: Es la sopa más deliciosa que probé.

translation.en: Na Na!
Na Na! Well, what do you think? It's too much, isn't it? I'll get another.
translation.es: Na Na, ¿qué te parece? ¿Es demasiado? Elegiré otro.

translation.en: It's great, Dad. Put it up in the front window.
translation.es: Es genial, papá. Ponlo en la ventana.

translation.en: - Yes! By tomorrow or no deal. - Hi.
Okay, hurry up with those dumplings. You, step aside.
translation.es: Apúrate con esos dumplings. Tú, a un lado.

translation.en: Good job.
Din! Hello? Where are the teacups?
- We open in ten minutes. - I'm on it.
translation.es: - Abrimos en diez minutos. - Ya voy.

translation.en: Teacups.
Teacups, teacups, teacups.
Long?
Greetings, great master.
Oh, a peasant child.
Long, what are you doing? You're supposed to be in the spirit world.
Yeah, uh, about that, uh, things got a little complicated.
translation.es: Sí, bueno, se complicó un poco.

translation.en: So, I'm back!
Back? To serve another ten masters?
You guessed it.
But, you've been waiting 1,000 years just to get through those gates.
translation.es: Pero esperaste mil años para atravesar esas puertas.

translation.en: I know, there was a parade and everything, but… you had one more wish.
translation.es: Lo sé, y había un desfile y todo, pero tenías otro deseo.

translation.en: It was the only way.
You gave all that up for me?
This is what I want.
For the first time, it feels like I have a little wisdom to offer. Maybe make a difference down here.
translation.es: Por primera vez, siento que tengo algo de sabiduría para ofrecer por aquí.

translation.en: Besides, there are no shrimp chips there, and I still haven't ridden in one of those metal birds,
translation.es: Además, no hay chips de camarones y no me subí a los pájaros de metal.

translation.en: and no air conditioning. No air conditioning in heaven!
translation.es: ¡Y no tienen aire acondicionado en el cielo!

translation.en: There's actually plenty of--
Thank you, Long.
Thank you.
Din, why is there a pile of broken teacups in the--
Know what? I don't want to know.
Okay, Din, let go.
Let go, Din.
See you soon, Long.
I am a god.
What are you looking at? A god, that's what.
translation.es: ¿Qué miras? ¡Un dios! Eso es lo que ves.
